Utility Styles

Concatinate in markup to extend current style to avoid writting extra styles directly to existing class

.u-margin { margin: 10px; }

.u-margin-sides { margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 10px; }

.u-margin-ends { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; }

.u-margin-top { margin-top: 10px; }

.u-margin-right { margin-right: 10px; }

.u-margin-bottom { margin-bottom: 10px; }

.u-margin-left { margin-left: 10px; }

.u-padding { padding: 10px; }

.u-padding-sides { padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; }

.u-padding-ends { padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; }

.u-padding-top { padding-top: 10px; }

.u-padding-right { padding-right: 10px; }

.u-padding-bottom { padding-bottom: 10px; }

.u-padding-left { padding-left: 10px; }

.u-no-margin { margin: 0; }

.u-no-margin-sides { margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; }

.u-no-margin-ends { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; }

.u-no-margin-top { margin-top: 0; }

.u-no-margin-right { margin-right: 0; }

.u-no-margin-bottom { margin-bottom: 0; }

.u-no-margin-left { margin-left: 0; }

.u-no-padding { padding: 0; }

.u-no-padding-sides { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }

.u-no-padding-ends { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; }

.u-no-padding-top { padding-top: 0; }

.u-no-padding-right { padding-right: 0; }

.u-no-padding-bottom { padding-bottom: 0; }

.u-no-padding-left { padding-left: 0; }

.u-block { display: block; }

.u-inline-block { display: inline-block; }

.u-overflow-hidden { overflow: hidden; }

.u-shift-up { margin-top: -1px !important; }

.u-shift-down { margin-bottom: -1px !important; }

@media (max-width: 479px) { .u-no-padding-xs { padding: 0; } .u-no-padding-sides-xs { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; } .u-no-padding-ends-xs { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; } .u-no-padding-top-xs { padding-top: 0; } .u-no-padding-right-xs { padding-right: 0; } .u-no-padding-bottom-xs { padding-bottom: 0; } .u-no-padding-left-xs { padding-left: 0; } }<

@media (max-width: 703px) { .u-no-padding-sm { padding: 0; } .u-no-padding-sides-sm { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; } .u-no-padding-ends-sm { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; } .u-no-padding-top-sm { padding-top: 0; } .u-no-padding-right-sm { padding-right: 0; } .u-no-padding-bottom-sm { padding-bottom: 0; } .u-no-padding-left-sm { padding-left: 0; } }

.u-hang-right { margin-right: -0.5em; }

.u-line-height-reset { line-height: 1; }

.top-buffer-15 { margin-top: 15px; }

.u-margin-t-none { margin-top: 0; }

.u-block { display: block; }

.u-inline-block { display: inline-block; }

.u-overflow-hidden { overflow: hidden; }

.u-shift-up { margin-top: -1px !important; }

.u-shift-down { margin-bottom: -1px !important; }

.u-no-margin { margin: 0; }<

.u-no-margin-sides { margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; }

.u-margin-ends { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; }

.box-sheer-sides { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }

.box-md { padding: 18px; }

.box-thick { border-width: 2px; }

.top-buffer-15 { margin-top:15px; }

.u-hang-right { margin-right: -0.5em; }

.u-line-height-reset{ line-height: 1; }

.u-margin-t-none{ margin-top:0; }

// adds 20px padding to top and bottom if on desktop, 10px top bottom if on mobile. Used for my account sections .u-padding-20-ends{ padding-top:10px; padding-bottom:10px; @media (min-width: $screen-sm-max) { padding-top:20px; padding-bottom:20px; } }

// used to give padding to area on left and right if on mobile. Used on my account Account history page right panel .u-sm-padding-20-sides{ padding-left:20px; padding-right:20px; @media (min-width: $screen-sm-max) { padding-left:0; padding-right:0; } }

// Used to wrap 2 columns and get rid of margin on desktop. Mobile makes it full width. Use 'overflow-hidden' on // the parent to elimiate hor scroll bars on mobile .u-sm-mar-10-sides{ margin-left:-10px; margin-right:-10px; @media (min-width: $screen-sm-max) { margin-left:0; margin-right:0; } }

.u-padding-65-sides{ padding-left:0; padding-right:0; width:100%; @media (min-width: $screen-xs-max) { padding-left:65px; padding-right:65px; width:auto; } }

<p>.u-margin { margin: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-sides { margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-ends { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-top { margin-top: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-right { margin-right: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-bottom { margin-bottom: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-left { margin-left: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding { padding: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding-sides { padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding-ends { padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding-top { padding-top: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding-right { padding-right: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding-bottom { padding-bottom: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-padding-left { padding-left: 10px; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin { margin: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-sides { margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-ends { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-top { margin-top: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-right { margin-right: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-bottom { margin-bottom: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-left { margin-left: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding { padding: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding-sides { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding-ends { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding-top { padding-top: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding-right { padding-right: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding-bottom { padding-bottom: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-no-padding-left { padding-left: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-block { display: block; }</p>

<p>.u-inline-block { display: inline-block; }</p>

<p>.u-overflow-hidden { overflow: hidden; }</p>

<p>.u-shift-up { margin-top: -1px !important; }</p>

<p>.u-shift-down { margin-bottom: -1px !important; }</p>

<p>@media (max-width: 479px) {
  .u-no-padding-xs { padding: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-sides-xs { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-ends-xs { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-top-xs { padding-top: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-right-xs { padding-right: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-bottom-xs { padding-bottom: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-left-xs { padding-left: 0; }
 }<</p>

<p>@media (max-width: 703px) {
  .u-no-padding-sm { padding: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-sides-sm { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-ends-sm { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-top-sm { padding-top: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-right-sm { padding-right: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-bottom-sm { padding-bottom: 0; }

  .u-no-padding-left-sm { padding-left: 0; }
 }</p>

<p>.u-hang-right { margin-right: -0.5em; }</p>

<p>.u-line-height-reset { line-height: 1; }</p>

<p>.top-buffer-15 { margin-top: 15px; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-t-none { margin-top: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-block { display: block; }</p>

<p>.u-inline-block { display: inline-block; }</p>

<p>.u-overflow-hidden { overflow: hidden; }</p>

<p>.u-shift-up { margin-top: -1px !important; }</p>

<p>.u-shift-down { margin-bottom: -1px !important; }</p>

<p>.u-no-margin { margin: 0; }<</p>

<p>.u-no-margin-sides { margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-ends { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; }</p>

<p>.box-sheer-sides { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }</p>

<p>.box-md { padding: 18px; }</p>

<p>.box-thick { border-width: 2px; }</p>

<p>.top-buffer-15 { margin-top:15px; }</p>

<p>.u-hang-right { margin-right: -0.5em; }</p>

<p>.u-line-height-reset{ line-height: 1; }</p>

<p>.u-margin-t-none{ margin-top:0; }</p>

<p>// adds 20px padding to top and bottom if on desktop, 10px top bottom if on mobile. Used for my account sections
.u-padding-20-ends{
    padding-top:10px;
    padding-bottom:10px;
    @media (min-width: $screen-sm-max) {
       padding-top:20px; 
       padding-bottom:20px;
    }
}</p>
<p>
// used to give padding to area on left and right if on mobile. Used on my account Account history page right panel 
.u-sm-padding-20-sides{
    padding-left:20px;
    padding-right:20px;
    @media (min-width: $screen-sm-max) {
       padding-left:0; 
       padding-right:0;
    }
}</p>
<p>
// Used to wrap 2 columns and get rid of margin on desktop. Mobile makes it full width. Use 'overflow-hidden' on
// the parent to elimiate hor scroll bars on mobile
.u-sm-mar-10-sides{
    margin-left:-10px;
    margin-right:-10px;
    @media (min-width: $screen-sm-max) {
       margin-left:0; 
       margin-right:0;
    }
}</p>
<p>
.u-padding-65-sides{
    padding-left:0;
    padding-right:0;
    width:100%;
    @media (min-width: $screen-xs-max) {
        padding-left:65px;
        padding-right:65px;
        width:auto;
    }
}</p>
